description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref: 18/04964/RG3 (Erection of part single, part two and part three storey buildings to provide a new primary school campus for Sudbourne Primary School incorporating community use facilities including a school hall with an enclosed rooftop all-weather multi-use games area (MUGA), a courtyard incorporating soft and hard surfaced play areas and sheltered outdoor learning and habitat study zones together with the provision of car parking and cycle storage spaces, refuse stores, formation a new emergency access and the retention and provision of new boundary treatments), granted on 11.10.2019. (As amended by non-material amendment permission ref. 20/03818/NMC, granted on 21/12/2020)Variation sought:To vary the approved plans to reflect the addition of an external play canopy.SUD-RTA-XX-00-DR-A-00110(PL01) - to be replaced with - SUD-RTA-XX-00-DR-A-00110(PL02)SUD-RTA-XX-ZZ-DR-A-00120(PL01) - to be replaced with - SUD-RTA-XX-ZZ-DR-A-00120(PL02)SUD-RTA-XX-ZZ-DR-A-00121(PL01) - to be replaced with - SUD-RTA-XX-ZZ-DR-A-00121(PL02)& SUD-RTA-XX-00-DR-A-00100 to be added
